name: DeFi Or Die
description: $DORD is here to show the TRUE meaning of Decentralized Finance (DeFi). $DORD will be launched as a BEP20 Token, and will slowly expand into it's own Vibrant Eco-System. $DORD has been conceptualized and crafted by developers with a vast experience in the cryptocurrency industry, providing FULL transparency for all investors. Backed by a strong development team and community, the $DORD token thrives through the power of its investors. Powered by its auto burn mechanism, $DORD has as its main aim to ensure constant deflationary pressure on the price of the token at all times.
